C

checkCollisions() - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block.BlockEntity
Check for and fix collisions with other BlockEntity objects in this BlockEntity's GameWorld.
Client - Class in bropals.lib.simplegame.networking
Implements the client-side of a basic client-server program.
Client(InetAddress, int, ClientMessageHandler) - Constructor for class bropals.lib.simplegame.networking.Client
Creates a new client using the given message handler and attempts to connect it at the specified address.
ClientHandler - Class in bropals.lib.simplegame.networking
Contains the skeleton to send messages to the server by the client, and to send messages to the client by the server.
ClientMessageHandler - Interface in bropals.lib.simplegame.networking
Lets the application decide how the client interprets messages from the server.
closeClient() - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.networking.Client
Stops communication with the server and stop running the client.
closeInput() - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.io.BinaryFileStorage
Closes the binary input if it is open.
closeOutput() - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.io.BinaryFileStorage
Flushes and closes the binary output if it is open.
collideWith(BlockEntity) - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block.BlockEntity
A method that is called when this block collides with another block.
contains(int, int) - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiElement
Sees if the point is inside of this GuiElement
containsPoint(float, float) - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block.BlockEntity
Checks to see if the given point is inside this Block Entity.
Counter - Class in bropals.lib.simplegame.util
Utility class for a simple counter.
Counter(int, CounterFunction) - Constructor for class bropals.lib.simplegame.util.Counter
Creates a counter with the specified target number.
Counter(int, boolean, CounterFunction) - Constructor for class bropals.lib.simplegame.util.Counter
Creates a counter with the specified target number and loop preference.
CounterFunction - Interface in bropals.lib.simplegame.util
Interface for the function that is used in Counter.
countFinished() - Method in interface bropals.lib.simplegame.util.CounterFunction
Called when the counter has reached its target number.
createHorizontialFlipCopy(BufferedImage, String) - Method in class bropals.lib.simplegame.io.AssetManager
Creates a copy of the image already loaded that is flipped horizontally.
